org.flowvisor.api

Class FVCtl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.flowvisor.api.FVCtl

  • public class FVCtl
extends java.lang.Object
    Client side stand alone command-line tool for invoking the FVUserAPI This is pretty hacky and just for testing; people should write their own clients and/or call the XMLRPC directly
    Author:
    capveg
